Literature & Books.name: Literature & Books Quiz 82
Literature & Books.description: This is a quiz about Literature & Books.

questions.text: What literary work is the source of the quote 'Abandon every hope, all you who enter here'?
Who wrote 'A Tale of Two Cities'?
If you are watching a Shavian play, who is the author?
What do the initials 'E. E.' in poet E. E. Cummings' name stand for?
In the famous baseball poem 'Casey at the Bat' Casey plays for the team from what town?
In the novel 'Around the World in 80 Days' Phileas Fogg's faithful valet is named what?
The film 'Stand By Me' is based on a novel by what author?
What Greek poet wrote 'The Iliad' and 'The Odyssey'?
